remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓您執行功能，例如點擊測試、 裁剪，以及清除筆劃。The enables you to perform functions such as hit testing, clipping, and erasing strokes. 控制項執行許多這些函式，但是如果您需要更多的控制，比提供，提供更多選項。The control performs many of these functions, but if you need more control than the provides, the offers more options. 下表列出了解如何管理自訂控制項上的數位筆跡的位置。The following table lists where to learn about managing digital ink on a custom control. |若要這樣做...To do this…|請參閱這篇文章See this article| |-----------------|----------------------| |建立收集數位筆跡控制項Create a control that collects digital ink|[建立筆墨輸入控制項Creating an Ink Input Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control.md)| |建立控制項，可讓使用者選取筆墨Create a control that enables the user to select ink|[如何： 從自訂控制項選取筆墨How to: Select Ink from a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-select-ink-from-a-custom-control.md)| |建立控制項，讓使用者可以點清除筆墨Create a control that enables the user to point-erase ink|[如何： 清除自訂控制項上的筆墨How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md)| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 物件項目用法XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values |詞彙Term|定義Definition| |----------|----------------| |`isfString`|字串，表示在 base-64 編碼 Ink Serialized Format (ISF)。A string that represents the stroke in base-64, encoded Ink Serialized Format (ISF).| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將在其中複製筆墨拖曳至另一個。The following example demonstrates how to copy the ink in one onto another . 這個範例假設：This example assumes: - 有兩個呼叫的物件`inkCanvas1`和`inkCanvas2`。There are two objects called `inkCanvas1` and `inkCanvas2`. - 事件已連線至事件處理常式。The event has been connected to the event handler. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 方法也可讓衍生的類別，以處理事件，但不附加委派，它是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用的技巧。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate, which is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫方法的基底類別，好讓註冊的委派收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當`applyToStylusTip`已`true`，則方法影響手寫筆筆尖，圖形以及筆劃的位置。When `applyToStylusTip` is `true`, the method affects the shape of the stylus tip, as well as the position of the strokes. 例如，如果因為旋轉90 度，筆劃移動座標軸而筆劃的寬度與高度似乎會反轉。For example, if you rotate a 90 degrees, the strokes move around an axis and the height and width of the strokes appear to be inverted. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何移動的所有筆劃。The following example demonstrates how to move all the strokes on an . 這個範例假設有稱為`inkCanvas1`。This example assumes that there is an called `inkCanvas1`.
